casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Corey Lopez JOHNSON 300P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 1, 2017 Mr. Perry J. Pelaez, Assistant Attorney General, Mr. Scott E. Thomas, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Mr. Corey Lopez Johnson, Defendant-Appellant, for Johnson, Corey Lopez.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th of September 2017 by Defendant for Notice of Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed Ex Mero Motu by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of November 2017."
